name: Chainworm Kommando X
description:
- Warning: Unfinished Prototype, don't expect too much-

66 million years ago, the asteorid never hit earth, and therefore the reign of the dinosaurs never ended. Instead, they evolved into human-like species called the Vari'isk, ruling the northern hemisphere. In the southern hemisphere, on the other hand, the Chainworms rule, also human-like descendants of threadworms.

For ages, both races have fought for dominance of the continent of Pangea. As a special unit you fight against the fascist plans of the lizard army. You are

THE CHAINWORM KOMMANDO
